https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powerapps/maker/canvas-apps/functions/function-clear-collect-clearcollect

You can use the 'updates function for one or more records of a 'data source":
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powerapps/maker/canvas-apps/working-with-variables

Data sources refer to 'connected' data sources (entities/tables, sharepoint lists, etc.), as well as 'local' data sources (collections):
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powerapps/maker/canvas-apps/working-with-data-sources

So using 'update' on a collection is up to a testing, but it can definitely be used for global variables.
